label: ham
subject:
svn commit: samba r23226 - in branches: SAMBA_3_0/source/lib
	SAMBA_3_0_26/source/lib
body: 20 (return) [ M. Levesque (Hist. de Russie, tom. ii. p. 247. Vie de Timour, p. 64—67, before the French version of the Institutes) has corrected the error of Sherefeddin, and marked the true limit of Timour’s conquests. His arguments are superfluous; and a simple appeal to the Russian annals is sufficient to prove that Moscow, which six years before had been taken by Toctamish, escaped the arms of a more formidable invader.]
